title: OPL week 7 tipping! (Last week!)
body:
Hey everyone!

http://i.imgur.com/Y3WUesP.jpg

Split 2 Week 7 of the [Oceanic Pro League](http://oce.lolesports.com/schedule) is up next!
I want to see who you think will win, check out the links below and put in your vote!
The tipping form will close at 5:30 pm AEDT on the 6th July.

[Click here](http://goo.gl/forms/PJXj5VvDN0) to go to the tipping form

This week anyone that can pick **8 matches** correctly will get the **250 RP!** 

You can catch all the action at our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania) starting Monday 6th of July at 6pm AEDT

Comment below with which match up you think will be the hardest to call and why!

This weeks games will determine the top 4 teams for our semi finals! who do you think will make it in?
